name: Soileum
description: Soileum Network is a next-generation blockchain platform designed to revolutionize digital identity and asset ownership in the decentralized world. Leveraging its proprietary Secure Open Identity Layer (SOIL) technology, Soileum offers a scalable, secure, and privacy-centric infrastructure that empowers users, developers, and enterprises. The SOIL Coin fuels the ecosystem, enabling identity verification, staking, governance, and access to premium Web3 services. With a focus on interoperability, Soileum bridges traditional systems and decentralized applications, driving innovation in digital identity, finance, and asset management.
